title: Cosmetic Substances Regulation Schema (Bilingual)
description: Unified bilingual schema for cosmetic substances. | 统一的双语模式，适用于化妆品物质

annexType.description: Regulatory category (Prohibited, Restricted, etc.) | 法规分类（禁用、限用、防晒、防腐、色素）

annexName.description: The original name or number of the annex (e.g., 'Annex II', '附录 II') | 附录的原始名称或编号（例如 'Annex II', '附录 II'）

country.description: Country or region of regulation (e.g., 'EU', 'TWN') | 法规所属国家或地区

dataSource.description: Source of the data (e.g., 'EU Cosing', 'NZL EPA') | 数据来源（例如 'EU Cosing', 'NZL EPA'）

isProhibited.description: Flag to mark this substance as prohibited (e.g., listed in an annex for prohibited substances) | 标记此物质为禁用（例如在禁用物质附录中）

referenceNumber.description: Reference number of the substance entry | 物质条目参考编号

substanceIdentification.description: Substance identification information | 物质标识信息

chemicalName.description: Chemical name / INN / XAN | 化学名称/国际非专利名

chs.description: Chinese chemical name | 中文化学名称

commonIngredientsName.description: List of primary INCI names. For the complete list, see 'identifiedIngredients'. NOTE: Data entry should filter out footnote markers (e.g., '(1)', '(a)'). | 主要的INCI名称列表。如需完整的物质总列表，请参见 'identifiedIngredients'。注意：数据录入时应自动过滤脚注标记（例如 '(1)', '(a)'）。

casNumber.description: List of CAS Registry Numbers (corresponds to commonIngredientsName if applicable) | CAS登记号列表（如适用，与commonIngredientsName对应）

colourIndexNumber.description: Colour Index Number (if applicable, e.g., for colorants) | 色素索引号（如适用，例如色素）

color.description: Physical color description (if applicable, e.g., for colorants) | 颜色描述（如适用，例如色素）

iupacName.description: Chemical/IUPAC Name (international standard) | IUPAC化学名称（国际标准）

functionNames.description: List of the substance's functions (e.g., 'Preservative', 'Hair Dyeing'). | 物质的功能列表（例如 '防腐剂', '染发剂'）。

substanceSummary.description: CRITICAL: A professional summary to be synthesized (from restrictions, warnings, notes) and include country name. | 关键：专业汇总（提炼而非提取）。必须基于所有可用数据（限制、警告、备注）进行综合重写，并包含国家名称。

eng.description: Synthesized ingredient summary in English (must include country name).

chs.description: 综合提炼的成分汇总信息（必须包含国家名称）。

formulationSafety.description: Formulation safety property. Use 'Not mentioned' if not specified. | 配方安全属性。如果未指定，请使用 'Not mentioned'。

usageConditions.description: Conditions/Restrictions of use | 使用条件/限制

productTypeBodyParts.description: List of applicable/restricted product types and body parts. | 适用/限制的产品类型和身体部位列表。

eng.description: Product types and body parts in English

chs.description: 产品类型和身体部位中文描述

maximumConcentration.description: Maximum concentration in ready for use preparation (e.g., '0.5%', '100ppm') | 即用制剂中的最大浓度

maxConcentration_leaveon.description: Maximum concentration for leave-on products (e.g., '0.5%') | 驻留类产品中的最大浓度

maxConcentration_rinseoff.description: Maximum concentration for rinse-off products (e.g., '2%') | 淋洗类产品中的最大浓度

other.description: Other conditions accompanying a specific product type or concentration (e.g., 'pH 7 to 9.5', 'For professional use only'). | 伴随特定产品类型或浓度的其他条件（例如 'pH 7 to 9.5', '仅限专业使用'）。

additionalRestrictions.description: Overarching restrictions not tied to a specific usage condition (e.g., 'Shall not be placed on the market...'). | 不与特定使用条件绑定的、更广泛的限制或禁令（例如 '不得投放市场...'）。

wordingOfConditionsAndWarnings.description: Required wording of conditions of use and warnings on product labels | 标签上要求的使用条件和警告措辞

regulation.description: Main regulation reference (e.g., 'EC No 1223/2009') | 主要法规参考

otherDirectivesRegulations.description: Other related directives or regulations | 其他相关指令或法规

sccsOpinions.description: List of SCCS opinions, each with its title and URL. | SCCS意见列表，包含标题和URL。

url.description: URL to the SCCS Opinion PDF

identifiedIngredients.description: MASTER LIST. The complete list of all substances (INCI, chemical names, salts, synonyms) covered by this entry. This field is the single source of truth for substance comparison. NOTE: Data entry should filter out footnote markers (e.G., '(1)', '(a)'). | 物质总列表。包含此条目涵盖的“所有”物质（INCI、化学名、盐类、同义词）。此字段是用于数据比较的唯一标准。注意：数据录入时应自动过滤脚注标记（例如 '(1)', '(a)'）。

cmrClassification.description: CMR classification (Carcinogenic, Mutagenic, Reprotoxic) - standard codes | CMR分类（标准代码）

updateDate.description: Last update date (ISO 8601 format: YYYY-MM-DD) | 最后更新日期
